Client.Name: Beijing Yuanshu Landscape Planning and Design Office

Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Beijing Yuanshu Landscape Planning and Design Office is a chinese outstanding professional landscape design institution. Since its establishment in 2004, through unremitting efforts, the company has made extraordinary achievements in landscape planning, public space, cultural tourism, theme design and other fields. Our strict design process ensures the perfect presentation of each design work.
R-land Yuanshu Design has maintained close strategic cooperative relations with many domestic and foreign institutions, which has played a positive role in the development of Chinese landscape architecture and international exchanges.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Over the past 17 years, R-Land has completed hundreds of design tasks. This time, we will store the excellent design products of the past on the chain for public display and long-term storage.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: Use open source tools to package data into car files and transfer to SPs
